name: Google Map With Fancybox
author: uzzal mondal

sections.description:
Google Map With Fancybox plugin is awesome google map maker , easy to use for google map that’s able to display google map with fancybox popup.
The easiest to use Google maps plugin! Add a customized Google map to your WordPress posts and/or pages quickly and easily with the supplied shortcode.
No fuss. No iFrames and super easy to use!

Some Features

  • Create multiple Google maps!
  • Super easy to use, no coding required!
  • Create as many map markers as you need by simply typing in the address
  • Responsive maps
  • Google Maps Streetview supported
  • Full screen map functionality
  • Choose from four Google maps types: roadmap, terrain, satellite and hybrid
  • Define your own width, height and zoom level for your Google Map
  • Google Maps Autocomplete
  • Google Maps Transport Layer
  • Set the max zoom level for your map
  • Create a map just in seconds
  • Enable Map Traffic Layer
  • Enable Map Bicycling Layer
  • Enable Map Transit layer

  • Fancybox popup System

  • Fully Customizable admin panel

  • 100% User friendly

  • All Browser Supported

  • Easy ShortCode System
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file.
  2. Log into WordPress, hover over Plugins, and click Add New.
  3. Click on the Upload Plugin button.
  4. Select the zip file you downloaded.
  5. Click Install Plugin.
  6. Activate.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the zip file.
  2. Log into WordPress, hover over Plugins, and click Add New.
  3. Click on the Upload Plugin button.
  4. Select the zip file you downloaded.
  5. Click Install Plugin.
  6. Activate.
